title: What should I know before my first day of teaching kindergarten? - Quora

response.answer_text: how to consume and process trough information fast so you can learn ahead and stay on top of the learning curb in order to break down complex topics into very simple ideas for little kids to understand. here are the habits I developed to learn things faster. isten to podcast / audiobooksconsume info 2x the speedreadmeditationthinkingdoing memory exercises.#productivity #productiveday #productivityhabits #stronghabits #newhabits #bulletjournal #journal #calendar #productiveday #todo #todolist #beproductive #productiveexecutive #productivity #productivityhacks #productivitytips #lifehacks #selfdevelopent #selflove
